Aug. 25, 1883 D Slaithwaite Contest
Slaithwaite Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
slaithwaite-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Slaithwaite, West Yorkshire Prizes: £25, £15, £10, £5, £2 10s. March contest - 1st Black Dyke, 2nd Trawden, 3rd Linthwaite. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 24, 2012, 10:28 p.m. Nov. 1, 2017, 10:54 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
2 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift William Tell [arr. Swift]
3 Boarshurst Silver Band Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
4 Trawden Brass Alexander Owen Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
5 Rochdale Borough Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
Unknown Result Holme Mills Alexander Owen Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Wyke Hugh Whitham Stiffelio [unknown arranger]
